mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_like WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND attraction_id = #{contentId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.content_id AS contentId, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.title, a.first_image1 AS img, a.addr1 AS address1, a.addr2 AS address2, ct.content_type_name AS contentType, True AS isLiked FROM user_like ul JOIN attractions a ON ul.attraction_id = a.content_id JOIN contenttypes ct ON a.content_type_id = ct.content_type_id WHERE ul.user_id = #{userId}
